content.question: In the period 600 to 1450 c.e., trade networks expanded and economic productive capacity increased. Technological innovations and transfers often contributed to this process. Develop an argument that evaluates the extent to which technological innovations or transfers led to increased economic growth in this period.

frqParts.text: In the period 600 to 1450 c.e., trade networks expanded and economic productive capacity increased. Technological innovations and transfers often contributed to this process. Develop an argument that evaluates the extent to which technological innovations or transfers led to increased economic growth in this period.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
